headline: BNY Announces Intention to Increase Quarterly Common Stock Dividend by 13 Percent to $0.53 per Share
summary: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation ("BNY") (NYSE: BK), a global financial services company, today announced its intention to increase its quarterly cash dividend on its common shares by 13% from $0.47 to $0.53 per share, commencing as early as the third quarter of 2025, subject to approval by the company's Board of Directors.

headline: Circle Wants to Open a Bank. What That Means for the Stablecoin Giant.
summary: Circle Internet Group  now has another title in its sights: bank.  Circle has submitted an application to the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) to establish a national trust bank called First National Digital Currency Bank, N.A., the company said Monday.  “By applying for a national trust charter, Circle is taking proactive steps to further strengthen our USDC infrastructure,” said CEO Jeremy Allaire in a statement.
